title: User logs into the system with valid credentials
preconditions: User is on the login page: https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has valid credentials: tomsmith and SuperSecretPassword!
main_flow: User enters username "tomsmith" in the username input field.
User enters password "SuperSecretPassword!" in the password input field.
4. System validates the entered credentials against the database.
5. If the credentials are valid, system displays a success message "Welcome to the Secure Area, tomsmith!" and navigates the user to the secure area.
6. If the credentials are invalid, system displays an error message "Invalid credentials. Please try again."
If the user enters incorrect credentials:
a. System displays an error message "Invalid credentials. Please try again."
b. User can retry by entering the correct credentials.
If the user leaves the login page without logging in:
a. System does not display any success or error message.
postconditions: If the user logs in successfully, the user is navigated to the secure area, and a success message is displayed.
If the user enters invalid credentials, an error message is displayed, and the user remains on the login page.
The user can log out from the secure area at any time.
